root.name: Pop'n Twinbee
root.description: Game Boy VersionÂ Twinbee Da!! was released for Gameboy in Japan in 1990 predating the SNES version by three years. It features simplified gameplay in comparison to the SNES version. The Game Boy version was released as Pop'n Twinbee in Europe in 1994.

similar_games.game: Psikyo Shooting Collection Vol. 3: Sol Divide & Dragon Blaze
